rocky-9.desc: Rocky 9 64-bit image with just essential packages installed. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

ubuntu-2004.desc: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.

ubuntu-2204.desc: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS. Built to run on bhyve or KVM virtual machines.
